author: adewit
body:
#### PR description:

This adds the HTXS Stage 1.2 classification. Stage 1.1, 1 and 0 also remain available. 

#### PR validation:

Tested with runRivetHTXS_cfg.py on various Higgs signal samples

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Not a backport
title: Adding HTXS Stage 1.2 classification
